title: What's Behind The Stark Rise In Children's Disabilities
teaser: A recent study finds that the rate of children diagnosed with a disability is rising â€” particularly among kids who come from a more affluent background. Dr. Amy Houtrow was one of the lead authors on the study, and she speaks with Audie Cornish.
